pancake.description: Sweet syrupy drums that will bring a unique texture to your beats
pancake.author: Dresage

biscuit.description: Puffy kicks and fizzy, quirky percussion gives you all the tools to make beats that don't skip the carbs
biscuit.author: Dresage

scone.description: Drums that hit but stay round and doughy on impact
scone.author: Dresage

electro.description: 808 kicks and snappy snares are the foundation of any track
electro.author: Bad

cookin.description: Clicky and clacky metallic found sounds that found their way to you!
cookin.author: Dresage

strings.description: Beautiful violin chords you can play with one finger
strings.author: Bad

stringsss.description: Beautiful stretched violin chords you can play with one finger
stringsss.author: Bad

buffet.description: A collection of female vocal pop runs and adlibs that fizz, crunch and manipulate pitch/formant
buffet.author: Dresage

jello.description: Female vocals with throwback 2000's soul and all the boyband era feels
jello.author: Dresage

funfetti.description: Female group melodies in harmony. A technicolor good time!
funfetti.author: Dresage

lit.description: Round analog synth sound for leads or bass
lit.author: Bad

meringue.description: A silky whipped vocal instrument you can play yourself!
meringue.author: Dresage

meringueee.description: A stretched silky whipped vocal instrument you can play yourself!
meringueee.author: Dresage

pluck.description: Lovely synth sound for melody lines
pluck.author: Bad

sine.description: The lovely simple tones of a sinewave

smooth.description: Smooth falloff on this synth tone
smooth.author: Bad

square.description: When you need more, reach for the square wave

trapezoid.description: A cross between a traingle and a square wave

triangle.description: Lovely bell like tones from this triangle

zap.description: Cut through the mix with this buzzy synth
zap.author: Bad

e-bass.description: Fill out the bottom end with this classic bass guitar
e-bass.author: Bad
